metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Windows XP Installation Music has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity.
key_conclusion: Windows XP Installation Music has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Dorian, E Minor,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
